conditions.li1: Your password must include at least one capital
conditions.li2: Your password must include at least one number
conditions.li3: The minimum length of your password is 8 characters

form.otherErrorOnUpdating: Something went wrong while updating your new password

information.1: When you have more than 100 penalty points, you are not allowed to make reservations.
information.2: Each week, the weight of received penalty points for misbehaviour decreases by 20% of the original amount of received points
information.3: In other words, the amount of points you receive will influence the total amount of penalty points for a period of 5 weeks.

li.1: Cancelling a reservation after 7 PM, the night before the date of reservation (starting at 15 points, increasing to 30 points an hour before opening)
li.2: Not showing up when you did make a reservation (50 points)
li.3: Keeping a seat occupied for yourself, or for someone else, by placing a bag/books/... on the seat
li.4: When you would really cross the line, an employee may blacklist you for reservation. You will get 100 points. These points do not decrease over time!
